31:4: al-la-zee-na  yu-qee-moo-nas  sa-laa-ta  wayu-too-naz  za-kaa-ta  wa-hum  bi-laa-khi-ra-ti  hum  yoo-qi-noon
31:5: u-laaai-ka  a-laa  hu-dam  mir  rab-bi-him  wau-laaai-ka  hu-mul  muf-li-hoon
31:6: wa-mi-nan  naa-si   mai  yas-hta-ree  lah-wal  had-de-si   liyu-dil-la  an   sabee-lil  laa-hi   bi-ghai-ri  il-minw  wayat-ta-khi-za-haa  hu-zu-waa  u-laaai-ka  la-hum  a-zaa-bum  muheen
31:7: wai-zaa  tut-laa  a-lay-hi  aayaa-tu-naa  wal-laa  mus-tak-bi-ran  kaal   lam  yas-ma-haa  kaan-na  feee  u-zu-nai-hi  waq-ran  fa-bas-hshi-ru  bi-a-zaa-bin  aleem
31:8: in-nal  lazee-na   aa-ma-noo  waa-mi-lus  saa-li-haa-ti  la-hum  ja-naa-tun  naeem
31:9: khaa-li-dee-na  fee-ha  wa-dal  laa-hi   haq-qaa  wa-hu-wal  azee-zul   hakeem
31:10: kha-la-qas  sa-maa-waa-ti  bi-ghai-ri  a-ma-din  ta-raw-na-haa  waal-qaa  fil  ar-di    ra-waa-siya  an  tamee-da  bi-kum  wa-bas-sa  fee-haa  min  kul-li  daaab-bah  waan-zal-naa  mi-nas  sa-maaai  maaaan   faam-bat-naa  fee-ha  min  kul-li  zaw-jin  kareem
31:11: haa-zaa  khal-qul  laa-hi   faa-roonee  maa-zaa  kha-la-qal  lazee-na   min  doo-nih  ba-liz  zaa-li-moo-na  fee  da-la-lim  mubeen
31:12: wa-la-qad  aa-tai-naa  luq-maa-nal  hik-ma-ta    a-ni  shkur    lil-laah  wa-ma-ny  yas-hkur  fain-na-maa  yas-hku-ru  li-naf-sihee  wa-man  ka-fa-ra  fain-nal  laa-ha   gha-niyyun  hameed
31:13: waiz    qaa-la  luq-maa-nu  lib-nihee   wa-hu-wa  yai-zu-hoo  ya-bu-naiya  laa  tus-hrik  bil-laah  in-nash  shir-ka     la-zul-mun  azeem
31:14: wa-was-sai-nal  in-saa-na  bi-waa-li-dai-hi  ha-ma-la-thu  um-mu-hoo  wah-nan  a-laa  wah-ninw  wa-fi-saa-lu-hoo  fee  aa-mai-ni  a-ni  is-hkur  lee  wa-li-waa-li-dai-ka  i-laiyal  maseer
31:15: wain   jaa-ha-daa-ka  a-laaa  an  tus-hri-ka  bee  maa  lai-sa  la-ka  bihee  il-mun  fa-laa  tu-ti-hu-maa  wa-saa-hi-bhu-maa  fid  du-nyaa    ma-roo-fanw  wat-ta-bi   sabee-la  man  a-naa-ba  i-layy  sum-ma  i-laiya  mar-jiu-kum  fau-nab-biu-kum  bi-maa  kun-tum  ta-ma-loon
31:16: ya-bu-naiya  in-na-haaa  in  ta-ku  mis-qaa-la  hab-ba-tim  min  khar-da-lin  fa-ta-kun  fee  sak-hra-tin  aw  fis  sa-maa-waa-ti  aw  fil  ar-di    yaa-ti  bi-al  lah      in-nal  laa-ha   latee-fun  khabeer
31:17: yaa-bu-naiya  a-qi-mis  sa-laa-ta  waa-mur  bil-ma-roo-fi  wa-nha    a-nil  mun-ka-ri   was-bir    a-laa  maaa  a-saa-ba-ka  in-na  zaa-li-ka  min  az-mil  u-moor
31:18: wa-laa  tu-sair    khad-da-ka  lin-naa-si  wa-laa  tam-shi  fil  ar-di    maa-ra-han  in-nal  laa-ha   laa  yu-hib-bu  kul-la  muk-htaa-lin  fa-khoor
31:19: waq-sid    fee  ma-shyi-ka  wag-hdud    min  saw-tik  in-na  an-ka-ral  as-waa-ti  la-saw-tul  hameer
31:20: a-lam  ta-raw  an-nal  laa-ha   sak-hkha-ra  la-kum  maa  fis  sa-maa-waa-ti  wa-maa  fil  ar-di    waas-ba-gha  a-lai-kum  ni-a-ma-hoo  zaa-hi-ra-tanw  wa-baa-ti-nah  wa-mi-nan  naa-si   ma-ny  yu-jaa-di-lu  fil  laa-hi   bi-ghay-ri  il-minw  wa-laa  hu-danw  wa-laa  ki-taa-bim  muneer
31:21: wai-zaa  qee-la  la-hu-mut  ta-bioo   maaa  an-za-lal  laa-hu   qaa-loo  bal  nat-ta-biu  maa  wa-jad-naa  a-lai-hi  aa-baaaa-naa  a-wa-law  kaa-nash  shai-taa-nu  ya-doo-hum  i-laa  a-zaa-bis  saeer
31:22: wa-ma-ny  yus-lim  wa-jha-hooo  i-lal  laa-hi   wa-hu-wa  muh-si-nun  fa-qa-di  is-tam-sa-ka  bi-lur-wa-til  wus-qaa     wai-lal  laa-hi   aa-qi-ba-tul  u-moor
31:23: wa-man  ka-fa-ra  fa-laa  yah-zun-ka  kuf-ruh   i-lai-naa  mar-jiu-hum  fa-nu-nab-biu-hum  bi-maa  a-mi-loo  in-nal  laa-ha   alee-mum  bi-zaa-tis  su-door
31:24: nu-mat-tiu-hum  qalee-lan  sum-ma  nad-tar-ru-hum  i-laa  a-zaa-bin  ghaleez
31:25: wa-lain   saal-ta-hum  man  kha-la-qas  sa-maa-waa-ti  wa-lar-da  laya-qoo-lun-nal  laah     qu-lil  ham-du    lil-laah  bal  ak-sa-ru-hum  laa  ya-la-moon
31:26: lil-la-hi  ma  fis  sa-maa-waa-ti  wa-lard   in-nal  laa-ha   hu-wal  gha-niyyul  hameed
31:27: wa-law  an-na-maa  fil  ar-di    min  sha-ja-ra-tin  aq-laa-munw  wal-bah-ru  ya-mud-du-hoo  mim  ba-dihee  sa-ba-tu  a-bhu-rim  maa  na-fi-dat  ka-li-maa-tul  laah     in-nal  laa-ha   azee-zun  hakeem
31:28: maa  khal-qu-kum  wa-laa  ba-su-kum  il-laa  ka-naf-sin-wwaa  hi-dah     in-nal  laa-ha   samee-um  baseer
31:29: a-lam  ta-ra  an-nal  laa-ha   yoo-li-jul  lai-la    fin  na-haa-ri  wayoo-li-jun  na-haa-ra  fil  lai-li    wa-sak-hkha-rash  sham-sa    wal-qa-ma-ra  kul-lu-ny  yaj-reee  i-laaa  a-ja-lim  mu-sam-manw  waan-nal  laa-ha   bi-maa  ta-ma-loo-na  khabeer
31:30: zaa-li-ka  bi-a-nnal  laa-ha   hu-wal  haq-qu   waan-na  maa  ya-doo-na  min  doo-ni-hil  baa-ti-lu  waan-nal  laa-ha   hu-wal  a-liyyul   kabeer
31:31: a-lam  ta-ra  an-nal  ful-ka     taj-ree  fil  bah-ri    bi-ni-ma-til  laa-hi   liyu-riya-kum  min  aayaa-tih  in-na  fee  zaa-li-ka  laaayaa-til  li-kul-li  sab-baa-rin  sha-koor
31:32: wai-zaa  gha-shiya-hum  maw-jun  kaz-zu-la-li  daa-wul   laa-ha   muk-hli-see-na  la-hud  dee-na   fa-lam-maa  naj-jaa-hum  i-lal  bar-ri   fa-mi-nhum  muq-ta-sid   wa-maa  ya-jha-du  bi-a-ayaa-ti-naa  il-laa  kul-lu  khat-taa-rin  ka-foor
31:33: yaaaayyu-han  naa-sut  ta-qoo  rab-ba-kum  wak-hshaw    yaw-mal  laa  yaj-zee  waa-li-dun  anw   wa-la-dihee  wa-laa  maw-loo-dun  hu-wa  jaa-zin  anw   waa-li-dihee  shai-a-a  in-naa  wa-dal  laa-hi   haq-qun  fa-laa  ta-ghur-ran-na-ku-mul  hayaa-tud  du-nyaa    wa-laa  ya-ghur-ran-na-kum  bil-laa-hil  gha-roor
31:34: in-nal  laa-ha   in-da-hoo  il-mus  saaa-ti    wayu-naz-zi-lul  ghai-sa     waya-la-mu  maa  fil  a-rhaa-mi  wa-maa  tad-ree  naf-sum  maa-zaa  tak-si-bu  gha-daa  wa-maa  tad-ree  naf-sum  bi-a-yyi  ar-din  ta-moot  in-nal  laa-ha   alee-mun  khabeer
32:2: tan-zee-lul  ki-taa-bi  laa  rai-ba  fee-hi  mir  rab-bil  aa-lameen

32:4: al-laa-hul  lazee    kha-la-qas  sa-maa-waa-ti  wa-lar-da  wa-maa  bai-na-hu-maa  fee  sit-ta-ti  ayyaa-min  thum-mas  ta-waa   a-lal  arsh       maa  la-kum  min  doo-nihee  minw  wa-liyyinw  wa-la  shafee    a-fa-laa  ta-ta-zak-ka-roon
32:5: yu-dab-bi-rul  am-ra    mi-nas  sa-maaai  i-lal  ar-di    thum-ma  ya-ru-ju  i-lai-hi  fee  yaw-min  kaa-na  miq-daa-ru-hooo  al-fa  sa-na-tim  mim-maa  taud-doon
32:6: zaa-li-ka  aa-li-mul  ghay-bi    wa-sha-haa-da-til  azee-zur   raheem

32:8: thum-ma  jaa-la  nas-la-hoo  min  su-laa-la-tim  mim  maaaim   maheen
32:9: thum-ma  saw-waa-hu  wa-na-fa-kha  fee-hi  mir  roo-hi-hih  wa-jaa-la  la-ku-mus  sa-ma     wa-lab-saa-ra  wa-la-fi-dah  qalee-lam  maa  tas-hku-roon
32:10: wa-qaa-looo  ai-zaa   da-lal-naa  fil  ar-di    ain-naa   lafee  khal-qin  jadeed   bal  hum  bi-li-qaaai  rab-bi-him  kaa-fi-roon
32:11: qul  ya-ta-waf-faa-kum  ma-la-kul  maw-til   lazee    wuk-ki-la  bi-kum  thum-ma  i-laa  rab-bi-kum  tur-jaoon
32:12: wa-law  ta-raaa  i-zil  muj-ri-moo-na  naa-ki-soo  ruoo-si-him  in-da  rab-bi-him  rab-ba-naaa  ab-sar-naa  wa-sa-mi-naa  far-ji-naa   na-mal  saa-li-han  in-naa  moo-qi-noon

32:15: in-na-maa  yu-mi-nu  bi-a-ayaa-ti-nal  lazee-na   i-zaa  zuk-ki-roo  bi-haa  khar-roo  suj-ja-danw  wa-sab-ba-hoo  bi-ham-di  rab-bi-him  wa-hum  laa  yas-tak-bi-roon

32:17: fa-laa  ta-la-mu  naf-sum  maaa  uk-hfiya  la-hum  min  qur-ra-ti  ayu-nin  ja-zaaaam  bi-maa  kaa-noo  ya-ma-loon
32:18: a-fa-man  kaa-na  mu-mi-nan  ka-man  kaa-na  faa-si-qaa  laa  yas-ta-woon

32:20: waam-mal  lazee-na   fa-sa-qoo  fa-ma-waa-hu-mun  naa-ru   kul-la-maaa  a-raa-dooo  a-ny  yak-hru-joo  mi-nhaaa  uee-doo  fee-haa  waqee-la  la-hum  zoo-qoo  a-zaaa-ban  naa-ril  lazee    kun-tum  bihee  tu-kaz-zi-boon
32:21: wa-la-nu-zee-qan-na-hum  mi-nal  a-zaa-bil   ad-naa   doo-nal  a-zaa-bil   ak-ba-ri   laal-la-hum  yar-jioon
32:22: wa-man  az-la-mu  mim-man  zuk-ki-ra  bi-a-ayaa-ti  rab-bihee  sum-ma  a-ra-da  a-nhaa   in-naa  mi-nal  muj-ri-mee-na  mun-ta-qi-moon
32:23: wa-la-qad  aa-tai-naa  moo-sal  ki-taa-ba  fa-laa  ta-kun  fee  mi-rya-tim  mil  li-qaaaihee  wa-jaal-naa-hu  hu-dal  li-baneee  is-raaaeel
32:24: wa-jaal-naa  mi-nhum  aim-ma-ta-ny  yah-doo-na  bi-a-mri-naa  lam-maa  sa-ba-roo  wa-kaa-noo  bi-a-ayaa-ti-naa  yoo-qi-noon
32:25: in-na  rab-ba-ka  hu-wa  yaf-si-lu  bai-na-hum  yaw-mal  qiyaa-ma-ti  fee-maa  kaa-noo  fee-hi  yak-hta-li-foon
32:26: a-wa-lam  yah-di  la-hum  kam  ah-lak-naa  min  qab-li-him  mi-nal  qu-roo-ni  yam-shoo-na  fee  ma-saa-ki-ni-him  in-na  fee  zaa-li-ka  laaayaa-tin  a-fa-laa  yas-maoon
32:27: a-wa-lam  ya-raw  an-naa  na-soo-qul  maaaa   i-lal  ar-dil   ju-ru-zi   fa-nuk-hri-ju  bihee  za-ran  ta-ku-lu  mi-nhu  a-naa-mu-hum  waan-fu-su-hum  a-fa-laa  yub-si-roon
32:28: waya-qoo-loo-na  ma-taa  haa-zal  fat-hhu   in  kun-tum  saa-diqeen
32:29: qul  yaw-mal  fat-hhi   laa  yan-faul  lazee-na   ka-fa-rooo  ee-maa-nu-hum  wa-laa  hum  yun-za-roon
